programme.title: Formation of Sword of Xingguo
programme.desc: The Independent Regiment and the Red Ninth Regiment fighting on the front line suffered heavy losses. The two teams led by Xiao Qiang and Chen Xiong thus merged. Liu Zao also joined this troop, at which time Sword of Xingguo began to take shape. Hearing that the party organization in the White District sent people to cross the line of fire for top-secret strategic intelligence, Central Revolutionary Military Commission ordered the Sword of Xingguo to rush to meet the intelligence officer and protect him at all costs to report the situation to the headquarters of the Ruijin Red Army. This became the first task for the Sword of Xingguo. Receiving intelligence about important military deployment of the enemys Lushan Conference, the Central Revolutionary Military Commission was determined to accelerate the strategic shift. The Red Army assembled in Yudu to prepare for the Long March. In order to allow more than 80,000 Red Army troops to cross the Yongdu River without alerting the enemies, the Central Revolutionary Military Commission decided to cross the river at night. The Sword of Xingguo was divided into two squads by order from superiors: Chen Xiong led a team to cut off communication facilities along the Yongdu River and eliminate possible enemy scouts in time; Xiao Qiang led the remaining soldiers to explore the depth of the river several times, ruling out the possibility of wading across the river and quickly building a pontoon bridge to help the main force of the Red Army cross the river. At the same time, the Central Revolutionary Military Commission and the Guangdong Army reached a secret agreement that the Cantonese Army promised to make way for the Red Army after crossing the Yudu River. The Red Army thus crossed the Yudu River and embarked on an arduous journey.

programme.title: Encouraging Fuel Conservation
programme.desc: New cars are everywhere, but Archibald and his gang are stealing our ecological fuel, making it hard for us to fill up. We need to conserve energy and drive less for now. Lets hope for a better future.

programme.title: Cars Search For Pink Car Sarah
programme.desc: A team of close friends come together to overcome the obstacles that Grady, a dishonest reporter, throws their way. With quick thinking and clever disguises, they are able to outsmart Grady and even save him from danger. Throughout their journey, they remain committed to their shared vision of developing sustainable fuel for a better future.

programme.title: Trouble Comes to Q-Town
programme.desc: A challenge arises as the airship of the Buster Gang hurtles towards the Q star. Their aim is to acquire enough metal to fix their crashed ship by stealing the giant statue in Q-Town. Flame, the new captain of the Q-Star League, steps up to stop them. The outcome of this encounter between the Buster Gang and Flame awaits with bated breath.

programme.title: Power of Flame
programme.desc: Flames unlocking of new equipment resulted in chaos in Q-Town, causing significant damage. However, a heroic figure emerged at the last moment to address the crisis and protect the town. With explosive power in tow, this fiery hero aims to save the day. Will they succeed in their mission?

programme.title: THE LOST NUMBER
programme.desc: After going renegade on a Foray, Kathleen an English woman goes down south to Ngara Town. Seeking redemption, Kathleen saves Ngara Town and becomes her new hero. But when Diwani (point man of the Foray) comes to Ngara to retrieve from Kathleen what belongs to the Foray, Kathleen must go against the odds to save Ngara from Diwani and a Foray striking for the very soul of Ngara Town.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 40
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: BeAFriend
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: VAMPIRE MOON
programme.desc: Buck goes to bed with a toothache and has a nightmare about being bitten by a vampire bat. When he awakes up he is convinced that he is turning into a vampire. At first the Creepy CandyTM try to explain to him that vampires are not real but when Buck begins acting strangely they start to wonder if could be true.

programme.title: Dragonfish Lake
programme.desc: The twins are out skateboarding and delivering newspapers to homes around Abra-Dabra, but Uncle Charlie warns them it can be dangerous as it might hit someone. But thinking of the possibility of the idea, Charlie tries a hand at throwing a newspaper onto Tiggy’s lawn, but ends up flying in through the window. On hearing a scream, Charlie rushes in apologising for hitting Tiggy, but it turned out that Tiggy was moaning for what he read in the newspaper. It was about a contest of the Chef Challenge Award featuring whether Tiggy’s rival, Chef Alfonse could win it. Tiggy always wanted to win the challenge but never knew what original recipe to make. Tiggy gets jealous as he reads Chef Alfonse’s fish-a-la mode recipe that he promises to create the dish himself and if turns out to be really good as the newspaper says it is, he will admit how good his rival really is. So Tiggy waits a long while at the lake to catch a fresh fish as the recipe calls for it. Soon all his friends come over to help him fish, each with their very own fish lines. Seems a little magical assistance can help this time. But the lake is now occupied by one big playful dragon fish. The dragon fish turns out to be really hungry, so Tiggy sets out to make the biggest beetroot and berry snack ever. The dragonfish gulps it all down happily, but Deedee is sad she couldn’t really help Tiggy with the recipe. Tiggy on the other hand is quite ecstatic that he was able to whip up the most original dish ever. So over pancakes the next day Tiggy discovers that he has been awarded the annual Chef Challenge Award for the most original beetroot and berry recipe based on the photo and information Deedee gave to the judges. Tiggy is delighted to see an appreciative comment by Chef Alfonse that Tiggy’s surprise-a-la dragonfish being totally top-notch.

programme.title: Kites Away!
programme.desc: It all happens for a kite! Don wants it… the rats wont let it go. And in this tug of war, an angry and frustrated King Chomp is funnily pulled into. It is a bad time for the rats and a very bad time for Don and Colonel.

programme.title: JOY RIDE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to clean the Lord of the Wind. They can’t resist riding the annual Surf Winds, but Xia and April end up captured by the Wind Beast. Pai rescues them by repulsing the sensitive Wind Beast with his onion and sulfur-geyser stink.

programme.title: Rose Trick
programme.desc: Dunky is taking special care of a beautiful red rose in his garden which he plans to give it to his girlfriend in the evening. And has just stopped Cat from almost ruining it.

programme.title: The Easter Episode
programme.desc: Wheres the Easter Bunny? And what are chocolate bunny eggs? Gummy and Friends are about to find out

programme.title: CHAPPAR PHAD KE!
programme.desc: Customers are complaining about the taste of the tea. Chai raja cant concentrate in preparation as the Radio is going on and off due to weak signal. Chai Raja orders Sundar to climb the roof of the tea stall and hold the radio for better signal. This is the golden opportunity for Basha, with Sundar on the roof; there is no one to guard the tea. That is not it. Basha tries everything possible to make the radio signals go crazy thereby making Chai Raja go crazier and Sundar running for his dear life!

programme.title: Silly Cat
programme.desc: Cat does nothing but just watches tv and lazes on the sofa. And has messed up the tv room with spilled water and popcorn and all things upside down.

programme.title: BANANA BANG!
programme.desc: Its Diwali and Sundar is extremely excited for he loves everything about Diwali...the fireworks, the lights and the sweets. Chai Raja though doesnt mind the mellower ones has an aversion to the noisy crackers as they drown out his precious radio and disturb his swilling rhythm. Also Chai Raja needs to concentrate as he has to whip up special jalebis, coconut laddoos and other sweets to entice customers into his shop even on the holiday. Customers do pour in but with an excess of kids and their Diwali pistols. Sundar already has his hands full keeping the knicker-clad pint-sized cops and robbersincheck..little does he know its just about to get worse for Basha has received a special Diwali hamper from one of his old fans at the circus- the cannon clown- a huge box of the biggest and loudest firecrackers. Basha descends with a decided bang on the tea shop and proves to be such a ballistic bother that despite all Sunders efforts the tale ends with the Chai Raja and his hotel getting a Diwali makeover that a is bit too charred than Sundar would have intended.

programme.title: Mystic Stick Gone Wild
programme.desc: When Pai complains that his stick is just like any other ordinary stick, Negu sends a horde of fake sticks, fans and swords to the Guardians. The weapons come to life and rebel against their supposed masters. April, Xia and especially Pai have to learn to connect with their own weapons to defeat the fake ones.

programme.title: Happy Halloween
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Beach Fight
programme.desc: Its Dunky’s day off as he packs a small basket and heads to the beach .He starts making a sand castle and is very happy with it…

programme.title: The Gingerbread Man
programme.desc: Old couple without a child bakes a gingerbread kid GoGo. GoGo escapes the oven, and runs away from the animals who try to eat him.

programme.title: Yes You Can - Pancake
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Crazy Cricket
programme.desc: Bee stings, explosions, and with frogs croaking around, this is no ordinary game of cricket. So will Don hit a six or would it be Marly?

programme.title: Whirlwind
programme.desc: Deedee is sadly whirling the magic wand wondering what to do. But no matter what Nino suggests, Deedee wants to have the magical version of it all, be it baking a cake or even walking. Finally they decide on the giant jumble jigsaw. Inspite of Nino’s efforts to have a non-magic activity, Deedee’s magic seems to be only solution to tackling the over-sized pieces. But the spell literally whips up a storm. Deedee struggles to control the whirlwind, but it whizzes past out of control into the field ahead. The jigsaw pieces fall in place perfectly but the whirlwind hasn’t stopped. The whirlwind becomes so naughty that it snatches Deedee’s magic wand away. The whirlwind wildly knocks down everything in its path and throws out all the things inside Tiggy’s house. Not to mention the letters of postman Charlie. Even though all are shaken up pretty much by the naughty whirlwind, Deedee is encouraged by all her friends to catch it. The whirlwind even plays mischief with the Tika Pila monster and also the Mayor! The Mayor falls with a bump out of the whirlwind, but luckily with Deedee’s wand. They decide to wear-out the whirlwind safely without magic. They come up with a plan and together do their thing. The whirlwind gradually gets tired and so does the magic wear off. Although it messed up the town, all of them have quite a laugh.

programme.title: The Egg
programme.desc: Gummy wakes up with a mysterious egg in his bedroom – and, over Harry’s objections, becomes convinced that it’s ‘Junior’, a future soccer star!

programme.title: Mouse Chase
programme.desc: A small mouse is very scared and just escaped from Hoodie and his gang to now hide in the house. Well from the pan into the fire as he realizes that Cat is worst then Hoodie.

programme.title: Mission Keet
programme.desc: Cat is frustrated that he can’t catch Keet. As he is shuffling through channels he sees ad on TV of the ‘Super Ace Parrot Catchers’ A quick call gets a snobbish Black suited cat with a briefcase Knocking on the door.

programme.title: Castle Down
programme.desc: Sneevil and Biggs dig tunnels underneath the Castle that bring it crashing down underground. Melody and Nardy must face their fears and work together to bring the Castle back up to Smightyland.

programme.title: Game On
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: FREAKY FRUIT
programme.desc: Deep in the dojo, the Fruit Ninjas discover some powerfully magical fruit, but their secret is discovered by the Clean Bee.

programme.title: Low Memory
programme.desc: Sneevil gets amnesia and the Smighties take him on a camping adventure. They have a great time with him until he gets his memory back!

programme.title: Money In The Bank
programme.desc: Money money money! Dons safe is full of money. And colonel suggests to put the money in bank. But, Charly Marly and Larry want to become rich!!! and they will just not let go of the money. It is pandemonium in the house and the bank. Bang bang bang!

programme.title: Library Trouble
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are in the library. And the library has rules – of silence and composure. But with the rats trying their level best to irritate don, the library is as noisy and dirty as a market place in no time!!

programme.title: Honey bees Attack
programme.desc: Cat is relaxing in a hammock under the coconut trees at the back of the house reading a newspaper item of an exotic insect whose sting can kill.

programme.title: This Is Speed Racer
programme.desc: The kids use the Mach 6 time machine to travel back in time to change their bleak future. They see the origins of the time travel car, their parents, and the rise of the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: Flash Blind
programme.desc: Don rips apart the parcel and out comes A Brand New Camera! Don is on a clicking spree. He makes colonel pose and ends up clicking Ballu. From friends to enemies to the innards of his tummy, he captures it all.

programme.title: Sleepwalker
programme.desc: Gummy sleepwalks – making himself an elaborate snack and proving that you can sometimes even have fun while you’re asleep!

programme.title: Cricket Match
programme.desc: Keet and Cat decides to play a game of cricket in the backyard with their own set of teams.

programme.title: Clothespin
programme.desc: What can Hepi and Briko make with. Clothes pin? Lets find out!

programme.title: THE LILY OF THE EAST:
programme.desc: The Guardians take a welcome break from brainteasers to go fetch pollen from the Lily of the East, which only grows in one faraway cave. Everyone (including Negu) is convinced the flower’s pollen bestows magical powers. After an arduous journey through a bamboo forest and a series of caves, the Guardians reach the lily. But Koto and Amkko (who have been following in disguise) snatch the flower! By distracting the two mutants with riddles, the Guardians regain the precious flower and its pollen, which the Elders wanted…to flavor their tea!

programme.title: Toothbrush
programme.desc: Be prepared to be brushed off your feet with this entertaining episode

programme.title: The Speed record
programme.desc: MewMew has a new stopwatch and wants to time everything that everyone does, to get to them to do it at record speed. Life in Abra-Dabra becomes intolerable as everyone tries to be quicker than the next person. Eventually Deedee and the others persuade MewMew to break all his speed records. When he achieves it no one applauds him, so MewMew realises that many things are better done in their own sweet time. He also realises that by doing everything fast, he is missing out on enjoying many things.

programme.title: “How To Ride A Bike”
programme.desc: Colonel has gifted Don a brand new bike. But Don cant ride even to save his life! Colonel trains him but in vain! He bumps into other cars, stalls, crops until he finally bumps into Ballu!

programme.title: The Boy Who Cried Wolf
programme.desc: The shepherd boy is bored of uneventfully peaceful days. One day, he gets an idea for a prank - to lie about seeing a wolf to his village people.

programme.title: The Beginning
programme.desc: Speed has just been reunited with his father, when Zile Zazic attacks, stealing the Mach 6. Speed, Speed Sr. and the gang get the car back and defeat Zile. Speed Sr., not knowing why theyre after the car again, goes underground to investigate. Meanwhile Connor gets a strange reading off the Mach 6. Soon they discover the car has a strange anomaly - it jumps forward in space. When they start experimenting with the car they get attacked again and realize this "jump" function has something to do with why Zile was after the car.

programme.title: Kites Away!
programme.desc: It all happens for a kite! Don wants it… the rats wont let it go. And in this tug of war, an angry and frustrated King Chomp is funnily pulled into. It is a bad time for the rats and a very bad time for Don and Colonel.

programme.title: What a mess!
programme.desc: The twins meet a girl who lost the key to her bike lock because she’s so untidy.

programme.title: Crazy Cricket
programme.desc: Bee stings, explosions, and with frogs croaking around, this is no ordinary game of cricket. So will Don hit a six or would it be Marly?

programme.title: Take A Dance On Me
programme.desc: Pancake is terrible dancer, and when he joins the Zoonicorns in their dances to make flowers bloom, his issues could disrupt springtime. You dont have to be perfect at something to enjoy it.Feelings are as important as skills.

programme.title: Happy ending
programme.desc: The twins jump into a story and find out that the characters are stuck, because the last pages of the book are missing. So the twins invent the ending themselves, discovering the power of imagination, and when they go back home they understand they can create a new recipe with the ingredients they’ve got.

programme.title: Knight Racer
programme.desc: Speed and his friends have succeeded in acquiring the missing part from the Shadow Organization, but upon trying to make it work with the Mach 6, they are thrust into an alternate reality where the Shadowy Organization is in charge. They must return the part to where they found it, in Shadowy Org HQ, in order to get back to the present. Now that theyve had a glimpse of the Shadowy org.s master plan, they know what they have to do to stop them.

programme.title: The Deep Freeze
programme.desc: After not following the steps to find Odessas hidden treasure, a frustrated Pancake enters the Zooniverse to find it covered in ice and snow. To "turn back on" Mt Zoonihorn, he must follow the steps and learn from his friends mistakes. Determination and following the correct steps can lead to success.

programme.title: Comet Run
programme.desc: X begins acting strangely, creating tension with Speed and the others. When X leaves to join the Shadowy Organization, Speed decides to infiltrate the Shadowy Org to save him. Speed soon discovers that X is working undercover. When Xs cover is blown, he and Speed must try and escape the Shadowy Organization HQ with the missing Part.

programme.title: Rock- N- Roll Don
programme.desc: It is chaos and war in the house. And in the middle of this, Don gets hold of a guitar. He sprouts a new passion- music! But for all others it is unbearable. They try everything possible to stop Don, in vain. Things go global when Colonel joins the team with his drums!! Noise pollution it is…

programme.title: Oh It's So Noisy!
programme.desc: Tomorrow is Scots birthday and hes busy preparing for when Duda shows up and causes total chaos in Scots house. With his house in ruins, Scot stays overnight at Dudas house. However, Dudas loud snoring keeps Scot awake all night. Scot hopes to close his eyes after Duda leaves in the morning, but the constant noises outside drive him crazy. The friends plan a surprise party for Scot; Unfortunately, the clueless Scott exploits them and tells them to shut up. Later, Scot goes to look for his friends, but they are nowhere to be found. Scot is sad because he thinks he has alienated his friends. As he walks home alone, he hears his name being called. Its Duda and the others! They surprise you with a special gift.

programme.title: Dunky Doll
programme.desc: Hoodie the crow is really upset with Dunky as he is so loyal that GrandPAs house & is the only house were he cannot steal anything.

programme.title: Where is it?
programme.desc: During a game of hide and seek Deedee and Nino come across a panicky Mewmew who cannot locate his key. Deedee creates a spell to get back all of Mewmew’s missing things and in come his key, including his long lost bubble-cordion and pocket fork. But Mewmew doesn’t want those things back as he had already replaced them. So Deedee offers to keep them as she couldn’t stand the sight of them being thrown away. On the way they find Charlie hiding from his lost but newly found alarm clock that is chasing him. The clock won’t let Charlie sleep a bit by ringing all the time, so Deedee offers to take it along with the rest. Deedee gets many more additions to her lost and found group as many more citizens of Abra-Dabra are affected with lost things. But as Deedee doesn’t have any space to store them, she puts up a give-away store. Now everyone’s happy.

programme.title: Shrunken Jam
programme.desc: Don is baking a cake.In an apron.Puts the batter in a container the oven.Turns on the KNOB.And then... when he opens the oven door, the cake is missing. He cranes his neck and sees that there is a hole on the back of the oven! That is it, Charly Marly and Lary will pay for this!

programme.title: Wild Pitch
programme.desc: It’s an ordinary bat and ordinary balls but the game is sure extraordinary. Watch Colonel battle with cascading red balls, while Don easily triumphs this game until Chottu Mottu and Lambu come up with a plan B.

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Aladdin unearths a bottle in his yard. On it is written Simsim - DO NOT OPEN. He and Jamillah are curious but Genie is downright terrified. He tells them that Simsim was banished from Genie School. Hes BAD. In a fearful state he tries to hide the bottle but ends up breaking it. Simsim is on the lose causing havoc in Baghdad and its up to Jamillah, Genie and Aladdin to stop him.

programme.title: Sing For Your Supper
programme.desc: Deedee is excited to prepare for Mayor De Pfeffle’s banquet the next night, so she is all ready for the much needed sleep and yawns away on her cosy bed. But she and all of Abra-Dabra is wide-awake because of Luciano’s late night opera rehearsal. The next day everyone is so sleepy eyed that they request Luciano as politely as ever possible that they could all sleep if Luciano didn’t sing at night. But Luciano is outraged and declares he will never sing ever again. Thinking that the problem is solved they all return to their homes to practice for the upcoming banquet. Deedee tries out a food invisibility spell on an apple, but ended making all the fruits on the table disappear. But the magic didn’t happen only in Deedee’s house, but all over Abra-Dabra in an alarming rate that Mayor De Pfeffle had to ask Deedee to find a way to reverse it. But when she turns back to her usual self and cannot find Nino, she sings out Nino’s name that make a cherry fruit pop up in a tree, and she is amazed to note that more singing brings the food back. So she rounds up all of Abra-Dabra to sing together to bring the food back. They are able to bring back some of the food, but not just enough for the banquet, so Deedee asks Mayor De Pfeffle to request Luciano to help them out. But Luciano is too puffed up in pride and indignation that he outrightly refuses. Mayor De Pfeffle has no other choice but to postpone the banquet. Discouraged and hungry, Deedee sings a little and gets a small morsel to give her hungry friends, but just then her plate is so full of food when Luciano sings out. He even comes to town-hall where he sings his best and all the food comes back. Overjoyed, Mayor De Pfeffle asks if Luciano would grace the banquet with his awesome talent. Luciano agrees to sing promising to all that he will never again disturb them at night.

programme.title: Unlucky Fred
programme.desc: Fred relies on his lucky dice for every decision. At a theme park, he loses them, and has trouble coping without them. Along the way he also loses Friday! Fred has to rely on more than luck to get them both back.

programme.title: Poder De La flor
programme.desc: The Super Six go back in time to find out the origins of the Smighty Stones. The Villains tag along, too and find themselves in the middle of a prehistoric dragon battle.

programme.title: Corky’s Prince
programme.desc: Corky discovers an alien frog who transforms into a handsome boy who is in love with her.

programme.title: Muffin Delight
programme.desc: GrandPA is out of town and Dunky is really up and grooming himself in the mirror and cleaning the house. He has made a special gajar ka halwa but quickly hides it from Keet and Cat.

programme.title: The Macaroni Plant
programme.desc: Gummy is determined to grow his favourite food – even if macaroni plants don’t exist!

programme.title: The Heroes’ Path
programme.desc: Xia is bored because it’s been days since Negu sent a Mutant when he finds the instructions for the “Heroes’ Path”. Pai and April laugh at what they think is a silly game for kids, but Xia completes each step with great excitement. When one of the instructions is to steal the Glove of the North, Xia begins to suspect something. Thanks to his quick wits he manages to save the Glove of the North and find out who was behind the “Heroes’ Path” – a mutant fox, sent by Negu.

programme.title: Don In Pain
programme.desc: Don happens to eat a ‘metallic hot dog’ which gave him a bad tooth. Now he wants it removed. Colonel tries everything possible. Even the rats come to offer their ‘help’. But that tooth just refuses to leave his mouth. At last, they are at the dentist’s and it is all funny and hilarious!

programme.title: Invisible Don
programme.desc: To take revenge on the rats, Don makes a potion for invisibility. He has one hell of a time playing with Charly, Marly Larry and even King Chomp. But there was some potion remaining. Oo la la! Who will drink it???

programme.title: Mouse Trap
programme.desc: Fred and Sir Percival are swapping practical jokes against each other. When Fred meets a hyper-intelligent mouse that Brains has, he “borrows” him to pull one last great prank. When the mouse goes missing, Brains informs them that no one else can defend them against the beastly Elephantoids!

programme.title: What Goes Up…
programme.desc: Mayor De Pfeffle is hosting a party for all of Abra-Dabra and is granting Deedee the honour of inviting everyone to assemble at 12 o’clock sharp. But with Tiggy having prepared all the delectable dishes and only one hour to get them to the venue and Deedee rushing to invite everybody; Deedee decides to use some magic for the timebeing. On sprinkling some of her ‘light as air’ magic powder on the plates and Nino stringing them together as the master knots-man he is, Tiggy is able to walk them over to town-hall like a bunch of balloons. Deedee and Nino get to invite Charlie and the twins just when Boris misfires his new fishing dart gun onto Uncle Charlie causing him to fall out of his hammock. The Doobydoos and Mewmew are playing together by trying to find which group can make the tallest team-tower, just when Deedee and Nino invites them for the party. Back at town-hall Mayor De Pfeffle and Tiggy create a floating food game, but Tiggy reminds the Mayor that he isn’t good at tying knots. When the guests arrive, Mayor De Pfeffle and Tiggy usher them in and tell them how to play the game, but discover that all the strings have loosened themselves and are floating high up near the ceiling. Deedee improvises and gets the twins to use their toy dart guns to pull the food-laden plates to themselves. The Doobydoos along with Mewmew make really tall team-towers and pull their jelly plates to themselves with glee. Nino pulls down a plate that happens to be a bowl of custard. Nino gets drenched in custard, but in a very delicious way.

programme.title: Remote War
programme.desc: Don and the terrific trio are at war for the TV remote. It all comes down to a swallowed remote that changes channels with every hiccup. Now that is very convenient. The mice get ready in Scuba Gear to perform a close tummy surgery to save the remote. Will sentimental soap or Jolly Good cricket win the Toss?

programme.title: The Short Report
programme.desc: Everyone is reading a popular blog gossiping about people at school. When the blog post Brains pictures of aliens, she risks having her secret identity exposed.

programme.title: Office Fiasco
programme.desc: Don gets a new office job and he is so excited to begin. Are the rats equally excited?? well they are – but for something else. With their pranks and tricks, Larry Marly and Charly make sure that Don doesnt reach his office. But, when he somehow reaches the office, they make sure that the boss throws him out finally.

programme.title: Coach Dad
programme.desc: Fred’s Dad wants to spend more time with him. He becomes the new gym coach at school. Unfortunately, he is so tough on the kids Fred has to use Friday to make fake notes from their parents, until Fred and Brains are the only ones left doing the tough workout.

programme.title: Alone Again Unnaturally
programme.desc: When Pancake goes away to summer camp, Maple has no one to play with. In the Zooniverse, the Zoonicorns are gone as well, and she must team up with Harold to find them! Always be willing to make new friends.

programme.title: Golden Eggs
programme.desc: Hoodie has his eyes on the hens eggs in GrandPAs farm. Keet has saved them once but is sure Hoodie will try again.

programme.title: Amor y fiebre en Ibiza
programme.desc: En Ibiza, donde la edad es solo un número, cuatro parejas se enredan en romances y desventuras.

programme.title: La perfumera
programme.desc: Natalia viene a la capital para promocionar su línea de cosméticos y aumentar las inversiones en la fábrica.

programme.title: La perfumera
programme.desc: Natalia viene a la capital para promocionar su línea de cosméticos y aumentar las inversiones en la fábrica.

programme.desc: A talk show tackling major news topics Al Arabiya-style.

programme.desc: Satisfying the needs of sports enthusiasts, Al Arabiya features specialized sports programs which aim to provide in-depth news and analysis on regional and international events.

programme.title: Mohtaram Ela 1/4
programme.desc: Director:Mohamed Hamdy - Cast:Mohamed Ragab /Lameta Frenjia - Year of production: 2010

programme.desc: Cast: Nelly Karim / Samy El Adl / Maged El Masry

programme.title: Jiran Al Saad

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: Its In Our Nature
programme.desc: A million wildlife species are facing the threat of extinction. But why does this matter to a tiny city state like Singapore? What do we stand to lose if our wildlife go extinct? Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: 20 Days

As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: Warning: do not watch Crave on an empty stomach. Because we’ll have you craving a creamy scoop of ice cream bedded on a crispy waffle. Or really, really needing to crunch into juicy fried chicken right now. Hosted by Charlotte Mei, the runner-up of Eat List Star, Crave finds out what gets celebrities salivating – roti prata, roast meats, sushi, satay, salted egg ice cream, buah keluak, and even an English-style big breakfast! Our celebrities’ cravings know no bounds, and anything from local to Japanese to Mediterranean fare is fair game – as long as they crave it. And there’s a little special by Charlotte. On every show, she will cook a dish – guaranteed to make you crave for it!

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.desc: Ted Warren returns from WW1 to find that everyone thinks he was dead. The culprit is Kent who intercepted his mail, rustled the Warren cattle, took over the Warren ranch, and is now after Ted's girl friend. programme.title: Athlete
programme.desc: Kohei, a former competitive swimmer, lives an ordinary life with his wife and high school daughter, but one day, his wife suddenly asks him for a divorce. He then has a fateful encounter with a beautiful boy named Yutaka. Yutaka dreams of becoming an animator while working as an online chat boy. At the same time, he is struggling to tell his father that he is gay. They are both confused but eventually become attracted to each other. Through these emotional ups and downs, their relationship grows deeper and deeper.

programme.desc: Jae-sik always says with confidence that he fears nothing but money. After Ji-yeong's death, he pretends to be the father of her daughter Eun-hye, who is blind and deaf, after the inheritance money. Though Jae-sik was annoyed by the little girl's disabilities at first, he slowly starts to understand her special way of communicating with the world with her little fingertipsâ¦

My Little Nightmare
programme.desc: After a traumatic accident during vacation, five friends make the fatal mistake of dumping their victim's body. But exactly one year later, Someone or something is back for revenge and it's looking for more than an apology.

programme.title: 90210 Shark Attack
programme.desc: Oceanography students at a Malibu mansion fall prey to a mysterious entity that leaves wounds similar to a shark attack.

programme.title: 1962: Halloween Massacre
programme.desc: In 1969, the FBI found a mask that belonged to the serial killer who killed 7 people during a costume party on Halloween night in 1972.The killer was never found. And along with the mask, the FBI found a video that tells the true story of that massacre.

programme.title: 1313 Frankenqueen
programme.desc: A group of five young men agree to act as "test subjects" for plastic surgeon Victoria Franks. But their getaway at Victoria's lavish Malibu mansion turns deadly, as their mad scientist hostess implements a nefarious and homicidal agenda.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Dayan from Duyos Humidors introduces the first Cuban-made cigar accessories legally imported into the U.S. in 65 years, highlighting their handcrafted humidors made from 100% cedar and other fine woods. He shares his personal connection to cigars through his grandfather's farm in Cuba and discusses the company's future plans, including customization options and collaborations.

programme.title: Privada Cigar Club
programme.desc: Join Claudio Groy, a master blender with over 20 years of experience, as he travels to Peru to discover the roots of tobacco. In this video, Claudio explores the unique process of growing, curing, and blending Peruvian tobacco to create a one-of-a-kind puro cigar.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Sean sits down with Juan Lopez of Gurka Cigars. Gurkha has several brands that cater to every premium cigar smoker, including the very elite. For many, Gurkha cigars are seen as a status symbol and are synonymous with sumptuousness and exclusivity. However, a beautifully handcrafted and aromatic cigar can be enjoyed by anyone and embodies the pleasure and enjoyment of all good things found in life.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Join host Sean Mobley as he sits down with Maurice Mears, the founder of JM Patriarch Cigars. In this episode, Maurice shares the story and inspiration behind his line of cigars, delving into the blends, tobacco selections, and the philosophy that drives the JM Patriarch brand. Get an inside look at the passion and dedication that goes into crafting these distinguished smokes.

programme.title: Privada Cigar Club
programme.desc: Join Privada Cigar Club as we dive headfirst into the intoxicating streets of Budapest, Hungary‚ a city that‚ has got history in its bones and soul in its streets. We are talking about a place where the old world collides with the new, where the scent of history lingers in the air, and the Danube cuts through like a vein pulsing with life.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: Join us as we take a behind the scenes tour of Florida's largest independent tobacco farm. Jeff Borysiewicz guides us through his tobacco farm, sharing tricks of the trade and everything that goes into the process of producing high quality cigar tobacco.

programme.title: Creekside Cigar Co.
programme.desc: In this episode, Dave and BG chat with Darren Joffrey of Principal Cigars, discussing the unique concept behind his "Boy Band Volume One" cigar project, where five master blenders created cigars inspired by Nina Simone's album "I Put a Spell on You". Darren explains Principal Cigars' philosophy of focusing on flavor and "mechanics" (burn, smoke output, temperature) rather than just flavor, emphasizing that every cigar is weighed individually to ensure consistency. They also delve into the brand's commitment to constantly evolving blends with new tobacco discoveries and the importance of open communication with consumers, distinguishing them from traditional cigar marketing.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar enthusiast Marcus Newman to review the Artista Falu cigar. Together, they explore its unique flavor profile, flawless construction, and overall smoking experience, sharing their expert insights on what makes this cigar a standout in the world of premium smokes.

programme.title: Guest Joshua Mishoe
programme.desc: The children's TV show, Gullah Gullah Island had the first beloved mainstream Gullah characters. Look out world, here comes the first Gullah anime characters! From Akan and Adrinka symbols to incorporating traditional and cultural elements of the Gullah Geechee, the stories of our ancestors come to life in Camp Geechee. Created by Joshua Mishoe, this young brother is spreading Gullah in a new and fascinating way that is destined to reach and teach scores of new young audiences. Get prepared to do a deep dive into the culture and Camp Geechee!

programme.title: Guests Niya Ameras, Janiah Slaughter, Tamika Smith
programme.desc: Yonathan Elias is joined by Niya Ameras, Janiah Slaughter and Tamika Smith, who play Couch Party for the Culture and for cash!

programme.title: Guest Lalah Hathaway
programme.desc: Lalah Hathaway is an incredible singer who’s the daughter of an incredible singer: Donny Hathaway. Her new album is called Vantaback and she’s a fascinating person to talk to about singing and music and how’her father’s influence helps her.

programme.title: Forks Over Knives

programme.title: Weight Loss Top Secrets
programme.desc: Award-winning dietitian reveals the top 3 secrets to weight loss! 1st of a series. Let's take it off

programme.title: The Kids Know
programme.desc: Thomas and Melody meet up with Vegan Evan, a leading young animal activist!

programme.title: What Your Spicy Vegans Eat in a Day!
programme.desc: This video will make you declare... I'll have what they're having. What they eat in a day? A feast!

programme.title: The Land Of Ahimsa
programme.desc: The granddaughter of a Gandhi freedom fighter returns to India pleading for a renewal of Ahimsa!

programme.title: American Beast (aka Beast of Prey)
programme.desc: After finding an old storage locker filled with his family's history, James Erikson begins a journey to discover the truth behind a mysterious piece of land in the small town of Solitude...

programme.title: Die In One Day
programme.desc: After a failed marriage, Richard is in search of his daughter Mindy. He meets Sasha, an aspiring actress who promises to help him. But the hope to get some quick cash by performing in a 24 hours play soon turns out to be a bloody game...

programme.title: The Midnight Man
programme.desc: Hoping to fix their dysfunctional marriage, a couple travels to an isolated mountain cabin to work out their problems - but the one problem they didn't anticipate is the maniac trying to kill them...

programme.title: Ouija: Reunión Mortal
programme.desc: Sucesos extraños les ocurren a unos amigos antes de una fiesta de cumpleaños en un gran almacén. Dos de ellos encuentran un viejo tablero de espiritismo y deciden contactar con los antiguos inquilinos de la víctima fallecida...

programme.title: El Resurgir de la Momia
programme.desc: Un grupo de estudiantes de arqueología despierta a una momia ancestral. Tras quedar atrapados en un bucle temporal, la única forma de escapar es derrotarla. A medida que aumenta el número de cadáveres, parece que la Momia debe recolectar las almas de quienes la despertaron para poder caminar sobre la tierra, para siempre...

programme.title: Jack y Jill 3
programme.desc: 10 años después de los últimos asesinatos atroces en la colina, Jack y Jill están de regreso para masacrar al elenco y al equipo de un programa de Internet en vivo que busca descubrir los secretos de la leyenda...

programme.title: Apuesta con la Muerte 2
programme.desc: Tras la captura de Carrillo y de su padre, Rogelio y Emilio asumen el mando del cartel. Ahora Carrillo recobró su libertad y quiere retomar el control. En busca del poder absoluto, se desatará una guerra sin cuartel que no respetará ningún límite.

programme.title: De Apellido Pesado
programme.desc: De Misión Texas son las hermanas Carrillo, heredaron el apellido que defenderán a toda costa. El Narcotráfico es el negocio de la familia que se expande a nuevos territorios, los carteles opuestos le piensan poner un alto a las Carrillo pero se tienen que atener a las consecuencias porque ellas son De Apellido pesado,

programme.title: El Sueño De Lu
programme.desc: Tras un intento de suicidio, Lucía resignificará su vida para seguir adelante. Al enfrentar la pérdida de su hijo encontrará nuevos vínculos y pequeños milagros; un encuentro y un viaje inesperado abrirán espacio para comprender que puede permanecer en la vida y descubrirá que la eternidad se contiene en un instante

programme.title: A Ellas Les Gustan Mayores
programme.desc: Ricardo Soto está casado con Miranda Robles, una mujer guapa con una afortunada posición social. Su esposo aprovechará esta situación para ponerle el cuerno con una jovencita mucho menor que él, sin recordar que el que ríe al último, ríe mejor

programme.title: Crónicas Chilangas
programme.desc: El Jairo, un joven esquizofrénico, cree en seres extraterrestres y siente que debe luchar contra ellos. Claudia es una mujer con sobrepeso que tiene una fuerte debilidad por la pornografía, hecho que la lleva a una serie de conflictos. Por último, está Juvencio, un viejo profesor jubilado cuya mayor preocupación es su hija tetrapléjica, cuyo futuro sin su ayuda o la de su esposa Anita le preocupa mucho. Los caminos de estos tres personajes se enredan cada vez más.

programme.title: El Retorno
programme.desc: Una extraña mujer mantiene expectante y desorientado al espectador cuando a diario habla con su hija y la presencia de su hija no aparece en ningún momento. Una historia no previsible que juega al despiste, por lo que, hay que esperar hasta el final para saber lo que está pasando la protagonista.

programme.title: La Sangre Iluminada
programme.desc: Seis personajes explican su compleja existencia entrelazada. Cada cierto tiempo, debido a matemáticas inexplicables, la vida de estos personajes cambia y ocupan el cuerpo de otro
